metadata.title: CVE-2023-28617 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
org-babel-execute:latex in ob-latex.el in Org Mode through 9.6.1 for GNUEmacs allows attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a file name ordirectory name that contains shell metacharacters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28617` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

emacs25 - 25.2+1-6ubuntu0.1~esm2
emacs25-bin-common - 25.2+1-6ubuntu0.1~esm2
emacs25-common - 25.2+1-6ubuntu0.1~esm2
emacs25-el - 25.2+1-6ubuntu0.1~esm2
emacs25-lucid - 25.2+1-6ubuntu0.1~esm2
emacs25-nox - 25.2+1-6ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xemacs21 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
emacs25 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '25.2+1-6ubuntu0.1~esm2').
org-mode package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
